captions.text: It's the "Deaf-Mute Game"!

The players will be
Anderson, Elidio and Gustavo.
They will make an interview.

Anderson will be the interviewer
and Elidio will be a specialist.

As the interview goes on, Gustavo
will translate it to sign language.

I need you to tell me what
is his speciality.

Elidio will be a weapons specialist.
Andy will do an interview

and Gustavo translates
it to sign language... Go!

Hi! Welcome to another Barbecue And Weapons
show. Tonight we will talk about weapons.

We are here with José Luiz, who was
born at northeast São Paulo...

A guy who knows everything about weapons,
for he lived over ten years on the US,

fighting forces from all around
the world, is that right?
Good evening, José Luiz.

- Good evening...
- You created a new weapon, is that true?

Right, I created a weapon that
has never existed before.

As you all know, the world was always
filled with weapons, like the first...

A stick, then the bow and arrow,
then pistols and cannons...

And which countries did you
have to go for research...

...Countries you went to
research these weapons?

I went to a lot of countries.
I went to Japan...
I went to India, to Russia...
To Italy...
I went to Spain...

- Surely you...
- Went to... Wait...
Wait, I'm not finished!
I went to Sweden...

I went to Portugal,
went to Colombia...

And today I have developed a
weapon which can throw arrows...

While throwing stones, while releasing flames,
and shooting .28 caliber bullets.

Approximately how
many people can it kill?
Well, it kills three...
No, no.

- It's much more...
- It kills eight people in one second!

And if you want to buy this weapon,
you can go to the company's website...
www.iwanttobuythisweapon...

.com... Or you can call
0800-4332973.

- And send a letter to...
- You can send a letter to...

34 Christian Naughty street,
apartment 22, block A, alley 3...
In the back.

Well, if you love our show,
you can contact us...
And I have here a viewer's question:

'How can I calibrate my shotgun correctly'?
An interesting question.

Well, for a good shotgun calibration,
you must use a pound...

No, two... Four! Four pounds
of gunpowder. Maybe eight.

With eight pounds of gunpowder
you can get a shotgun well loaded.

How many people can you kill
with eight pounds of gunpowder?
Three... Eight people!
The "Deaf-Mute Game"!

Look at the state of
our colombian player...
Thanks for inviting me...

I think I will get
thinner than anyone!
Give it up, ladies and gentlemen!

CIA. BARBIXAS DE HUMOR
presented

IMPROVÁVEL
Probably a good show.

comments.text:
guri.. n entendi... explicando: pra surdos (independente se falam com a 
boca [no caso, oralizar], ou n!) o certo é Língua (LIBRAS - Língua 
Brasileira Sinais), linguagem é + pra uma forma de se expressar: dança, 
pintura, mimica << linguagens. E mudo não esta relacionado à pessoa surda. 
Se o surdo quiser oralizar, oraliza sim, alguns não querem ou não podem, 
mas os surdos tem voz, fazem sons, então não são mudos, o termo 
"surdo-mudo" esta errado... baita texto, mas n sei ser sucinta pra isso
